Our Pricing

Transparent pricing for all our services.

Please include the following fees:

(Make check payable to Prater Processing Services LLC)

(All invoices are paid within 1-3 business days)

Standard Subpoena Services

Skip Traces .................................................. $50.00

Searches and Reports ........................... $50.00

Rush .............................................................. $95.00

(First attempt made within 24 hours & additional attempts made every day in Philadelphia)

Standard .................................................... $55.00

(First attempt made by the end of the requested day & additional attempts if needed in Philadelphia)

Next Day .................................................... $50.00

(First attempt made within 48 hours & additional attempts made every subsequent day in Philadelphia)

First Defendant at Address (Above Prices)

Each Additional ........................................ $15.00

Out of Philadelphia

Pricing is subject to change outside of Philadelphia and in New Jersey area over 20 miles:

3 Attempts By The End of the Week ............ $75.00 to $100.00

3 Attempts Within 4 Days .......................... $110.00

3 Attempts Within 2 Days .......................... $120.00

First Attempt made By The End Of The Requested Day ........................................... $160.00

LEVEL OF SERVICES

Prater Processing Services, INC. Provides Three (3) levels of service:

  1. Today: First attempt made by the end of the requested day and additional attempts if needed.
  2. Next Day: First attempt made within 48 hours and additional attempts made every subsequent day if needed.
  3. Standard: First attempt made within 72 hours and additional attempts made every two (2) days if needed.
